div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 952 Izvorite, Blagoevgrad district, Bul- garia, 1938 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 5+ AR. Small pot hoard Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: Sofia 5 Gerasimov, BIAB 12 (1938), p. 456 Thompson, Athens, p. 522 (Simitlii)
